Literature.Title: Mining human microbiomes reveals an untapped source of peptide antibiotics
Literature.Author: Torres MDT, Brooks EF, Cesaro A, Sberro H, Gill MO, Nicolaou C, Bhatt AS, de la Fuente-Nunez C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli AIC221(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli AIC222(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1556(MIC=>128µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 700802(MIC=>128µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=8µM),Akkermansia muciniphila ATCC BAA-635(MIC=>128µM),Bacteroides eggerthii ATCC 27754(MIC=>128µM),Bacteroides fragilis ATCC 25285(MIC=>128µM),Bacteroides ovatus ATCC 8483(MIC=>128µM),Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron ATCC 29148(MIC=>128µM),Bacteroides uniformis ATCC 8492(MIC=>128µM),Bacteroides vulgatus ATCC 8482(MIC=>128µM),Collinsella aerofaciens ATCC 25986(MIC=>128µM),Clostridium scindens ATCC 35704(MIC=>128µM),Clostridium spiroforme ATCC 29900(MIC=>128µM),Eubacterium rectale ATCC 33656(MIC=>128µM),Parabacteroides distasonis ATCC 8503(MIC=>128µM),Prevotella copri DSM 18205(MIC=>128µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma Caco-2(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>64µM)
